long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Thekr - Muslims Prayer Times Extension

Thekr is Islamic extension keeps you connected with your prayers. Provides daily updated prayer times for any city worldwide and sends in-browser timely notifications to reminder you when it's time to pray.

Key Features:

1. Daily Updated Prayer Times: Automatically fetches and displays accurate prayer times based on your location, supporting all cities globally.

2. Timely Notifications: Receive popup notifications for each prayer time, ensuring you're always reminded when it's time to pray.

3. Calculation Methods: Supports different calculation methods for prayer times, allowing you to choose the one that aligns with your practice.

4. Language Support: Provides notifications in both English and Arabic, catering to a diverse audience.

5. Customizable Settings: Adjust notification preferences, language settings, and calculation methods to suit your needs.
